description: Rent Token is the first ever cryptocurrency token that will offer a full rental ecosystem for both tenants and landlords, and provide both a buyback and burn program for token holders so that our token will always be a deflationary style token. Our full ecosystem is a revolutionary on-blockchain solution to the rental industry providing an arsenal of useful services for both tenants and landlords. We will be effectively working to eliminate the rental management industry by providing blockchain solutions at a much lower price and all with one click, turnkey solutions effectively undercutting a $77 billion industry.What rental management companies charge for rental management can be as much as $100 per flat per month, while we can offer all of the things they offer on blockchain for 80% less of the cost with our revolutionary instant ticket and support systems all provided in-app.
name: Rent Token
